heading: This Afternoon
text: Snow developing along and west of the Greens, with 1 to 3 inches, spreading north and east mid to late afternoon; with a trace to 2 inches. Highs from the mid 20s to around 30, except low to mid 30s in far southern valleys and in the Champlain Valley. South to southeast winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Cloudy. Snow likely, tapering off near and south of Route 4 after midnight; another 1 to 3 inches, with locally higher amounts in the northern mountains. Lows from the mid 20s to around 30 south, and upper teens to mid 20s north, with some lower 20s far north. Southeast 5 to 10 mph, becoming northwest late.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy from the northern Greens eastward, with scattered snow showers, mainly in the morning. Mostly to partly cloudy west and south. Highs from the upper 20s to mid 30s in the south, and mid 20s to around 30 north. Northwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the morning.
